https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1RVNlm20V6yEUQQdvGCftKFugaE.jpg A 19 year old nonconformist poet living in 1947 Czechoslovakia is blind to the Communist behemoth looking over him, and instead lives a bohemian life with sexually liberated girls. 3 Seasons in Hell
